column4: ok...haha...by the way...how is the new ubuntu ibex? anyone think its worth the upgrade
ive had fewer issues (ie, none) with ibex than any other ubuntu
thats possibly true, but compiz is possibly cooler than mac so there
compiz is nice, so long as you keep ahold of your config...nothin worse than spending 2 hours making it perfect and then losing it in a harddrive wipe
